TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RadioButton extends System.Windows.Forms.RadioButton

summary.span: 表示可添加到 Microsoft Office Excel 工作表的 Windows 窗体 。

span.span: Represents a Windows Forms that can be added to a Microsoft Office Excel worksheet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与不同。The is different from a . 具有其他成员, 使其能够添加到 Excel 工作表, 并为其提供附加方法和属性。The has additional members that enable it to be added to an Excel worksheet and that give it additional methods and properties. 不要使用`New`构造函数来创建新的。Do not use the `New` constructor to create a new . 使用方法将新添加到工作表中。 Use the method to add a new to a worksheet.

summary.span: 获取 的 Z 顺序位置。

value.span: 的 Z 顺序位置。

remarks.format: ## Remarks Z 顺序由集合决定。The z-order is determined by the collection. 在任何对象集合中, z 顺序后面的对象是*集合*(1), z 顺序的前面的对象是*集合*`Count`(*集合*)。In any collection of objects, the object at the back of the z-order is *collection*(1), and the object at the front of the z-order is *collection*(*collection*.`Count`). ## Examples 有关演示如何使用此属性的代码示例, 请参见。For a code example that demonstrates how to use this property, see . 命名空间中的所有控件都具有功能`ZOrder`等效的属性。All controls in the namespace have a functionally equivalent `ZOrder` property.
